sentences.english: To summarize the effects of rehabilitation nursing for 112 stroke patients with dysphagia.

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the training method of comprehensive competence for junior nurses in burn department.

sentences.english: " Gentling " means training it to except accept the human attention need it needed for care and gloomygrooming.

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effective nursing in three-stage prevention of periodontitis.

sentences.english: Objective: To probe into the effect of emotion nursing to improve post-stroke depression for cerebral apoplexy patients.

改善产前和围产期护理。

sentences.english: This paper summarizes the nursing experience for 11 cases with locked-in syndrome.
